ch.alexandrahauri.kiosk.business

Class KioskManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.alexandrahauri.kiosk.business.KioskManager

  • public class KioskManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The KioskManager handles all the main Tasks. KioskManager is a singleton
